title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
After the Browns win over the Broncos without Baker Mayfield, Colin points out the difference between quarterback talent and value. He reacts to Phil Simms saying Joe Burrow is a modern-day Joe Montana and why that sounds like a compliment but it's actually not a good thing. He shares his Blazing 5 picks for week 7 of the NFL. Plus, Packers TE Marcedes Lewis joins the show to give his thoughts on Aaron Rodgers trolling the fans in Chicago and if they are ready to contend for a Super Bowl this year after back-to-back trips to the NFC Championship game. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
